message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. Inflation will hurt us both if we keep playing, and we'll both come out ahead with this deal.
Bob, I appreciate the sentiment of an even split, but time is money.  I'm being flexible, but let's settle this before inflation eats away any more of your potential gain.
Alice, I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share to end this, but let's not let inflation erode our potential gains further. This is my final offer.
